500: We're sorry, we did not receive a response from our system, please try searching for your holiday again in a few minutes.
If you still experience problems, please call 0844 879 8444 (Mon – Sun: 8am – 10pm)
1008: Sorry, there are currently no holidays available that meet your search criteria. Please change your departure date and/or duration options, or change your star rating and/or board basis options.
Your holiday may not be available on the dates you are searching, view more dates to see our popular holiday destinations.
Alternatively, for flexible departure airports and flight durations, please visit our flight + hotel page.
If you still experience problems, please call 01733 224 800 (Mon – Sun: 8am – 10pm) to speak to a travel advisor. [Error Code: 1008]

tooltip.contactPhone: From time to time we may have to contact you about important changes to your booking. So please provide a contact number and email address.

nextStep1.line1: You will receive a confirmation e-mail containing all of your booking information. You can also print out a copy of this page for your records.
nextStep1.line2: Within 5 days of booking, we will send you an email with your Travel Documents, Tour Operator Invoice and ATOL certificate attached.
nextStep1.line3: Please note: If you're flying with Thomas Cook Airlines you are no longer required to present a printed copy of your tickets or travel documentation to check-in for your flight.

nextStep2.line1: When you fly with Thomas Cook Airlines you can choose and
nextStep2.line2: If you have selected "Choose your seat" at the time of booking, please

nextStep3.line1: To check in, you’ll need to complete  Advanced Passenger Information for all passengers. Why not tick this off your list sooner rather than later?

priceTicket.alsoIncluded: Also included in your final holiday price

customise.title: Holiday essentials
customise.subtitle: Choose or remove from the available extras listed below

price.title: Your holiday price
price.content: Your holiday price is now correct for your entire party. However, it may vary from the price you saw previously due to system updates - see How Is My Holiday Cost Calculated for details on how your holiday price is calculated

insurance.title: Travel insurance
insurance.content: Thomas Cook Retail Limited is an Appointed Representative of White Horse Insurance Ireland Limited which is authorised and regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland. Thomas Cook Travel Insurance is underwritten by White Horse Insurance Ireland Limited. For more information visit Central Bank of Ireland website.

extras.error: There was an error submitting your request, please try again or contact support if the problem persists

TCFD.description: Please dontate just £2 on top of your holiday cost and we will pass it on to the Thomas Cook Children's charity - which aims to improve the lives of children and the communities in which they live across the world.
TCFD.checkBoxText: Yes please, we would like to donate.

CYS.title: Choose your seat
CYS.description:
• Use our handy online seating plan to choose and reserve your seats.
  • It's available as soon as your booking has been confirmed.
CYS.checkBoxText: Yes please, we could like to choose our own seats.
CYS.includedMessage: Choose your seat is already included.

IFM.description:
• 3 course hot meal witha tea of coffee
  • Meals included on your outbound and return flights
  • Meals can only be selected for the whole party
IFM.footerDescription: Created by James Martin. Only on Thomas Cook
IFM.checkBoxText: Yes please, we would like to add in-flight meals
IFM.includedMessage: In-flight meals are included in your holiday price. Please select from the available options

BAG.title: Add extra luggage allowance
BAG.description:
Your current luggage allowance is kg each and up to two pieces of luggage each.

You can increase your total per person allowance for your whole party.
BAG.checkBoxText: Yes please, we would like to add an extra luggage allowance

OFFER.description:
Add extra luggage allowance and choose your seat, and get your in-flight meals for free!

  • Extra luggage allowance: Your standard luggage allowance is kg per person. By choosing this option you will get an extra 5kg per person.
  • Choose Your Seat: Use our handy online seating plan to choose and reserve your seats. It's available as soon as your booking is confirmed.
  • in-flight meals: Enjoy a 3 course hot meal with a tea or coffee on your outbound and return flights. If you require a meal other than the standard option then please make your selection in the flight meals section below.
3 for 2 flight extras can only be selected for your whole party

INSURANCE.title: Travel insurance
INSURANCE.checkBoxText: Yes please, we would like to add travel insurance
INSURANCE.description:
Take away the stress of organising your travel insurance by booking it now with your holiday. The prices shown below include all insurance taxes.

  • 24 hour, 365 days emergency assistance number
  • Book today for immediate cancellation cover
  • Medical screening service available
INSURANCE.descriptionExtended: When booking your holiday you will need to ensure that all passengers take out travel insurance before they depart

gold.detailsList:
• Emergency Medical Expenses up to £10,000,000
  • Baggage and personal effets up to £3,000
  • Cancellation and curtailment up to £10,000

silver.detailsList:
• Emergency Medical Expenses up to £5,000,000
  • Baggage and personal effets up to £1,500
  • Cancellation and curtailment up to £5,000

stageOne.blurb: Please enter the passenger ages. The ages must be as per the date you purchase the insurance (today's date). The insurance price dependent on your age, so the price of insurance may go up or down. Insurance can only be purchased online for the whole party and for single trip policies. Please call 0871 895 0045 once you have made your holiday reservation. Infants (age <2) are covered free of charge.
stageOne.passengerDescription: Date of birth of the {0} in the room

stageTwo.agree: Tick here to confirm you have read and understood the terms and conditions for the purchase of this travel insurance policy
stageTwo.links:
• Are you eligable to buy our insurance?
  • Further information on existing medical conditions
  • View policy limits and full policy wording
stageTwo.terms: TRAVEL INSURANCE: Thomas Cook Retail Limited is an Appointed Representative of White Horse Insurance Ireland Limited which is authorised and regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland. Thomas Cook Travel Insurance is underwritten by White Horse Insurance Ireland Limited. For more information visit Central Bank of Ireland website.

index.blurb: The online holiday hub designed to make choosing and booking your next Thomas Cook getaway effortless.
index.blurb2: Keep track of all the hotels that caught your eye on our site through our wishlist feature and store your details on your My Details page to speed up your bookings in future.
index.dreamHoliday: Your dream holiday is just a click away...

details.description: Complete your profile and speed through the booking process - you can of course update these at any time you wish. preference.switchHoliday: Switch into holiday mode! Use the button switches below to receive your weekly dose of sunshine straight into your e-mail inbox from our Thomas Cook extras.
preference.latestPrices: The latest prices in your favorite cities, top deals in dream destinations and personalised recommendations. Get inspired!
preference.planYourTrip: Plan your trip with hand-picked deals and notifications from our travel experts. Let us make booking even easier.
preference.everyFriday: Every Friday we’ll send you our biggest and best discounts
preference.lazySundaysText: No need to rush - our Lazy Sunday edition includes subscriber-only deals, promotional offers and unpdates on our newest features.

support.blurb: You should be able to find all the information you need on our website. However, if you need any extra support with your holiday choice or how to use our site then please contact our dedicated team online via live chat (here for you 9am - 6pm daily) or via email.
